settings.text: Howdy! We're closed until Jan 2nd, 2019. Feel free to place an order for the New Year!

settings.title: Image with text
settings.description: Use a combination of image and text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store

settings.heading: Letters from the Farm
settings.subheading: Tune in for updates & new menus

settings.heading: Reconnect with Your Local Farmers
settings.text: Green Top Farms is an urban farm & kitchen delivering catering and personal meals anywhere in NYC. Founded by a 5th generation farmer, we grow our greens hydroponically and source the balance of our rotating menus from family farms across Jersey, Long Island and New York State.

settings.title: Reconnect with your local farmers
settings.subtitle: Green Top Farms is an urban farm & kitchen delivering catering and personal meals anywhere in NYC. Founded by a 5th generation farmer, we grow our greens hydroponically and source the balance of our rotating menus from family farms across Jersey, Long Island and New York State.

settings.title: Good food ain't radical
settings.subtitle: When food is centered around profit instead of soil quality, it lacks what our bodies need on a cellular level. That's why these days you can eat a whole bunch of calories but still have cravings and crashes. Often times these processed foods can make us sick. Good soil means nutritious produce and eating fresh means you're getting all those nutrients. We're trying to keep it pretty simple.
